author: lego_here
title: the cheapest lego star wars set!!
review:
pros 
cheap set
you get a figure
nice addition to any collection
I like the way they used axes to move instead of the usual skis you can get

cons
should have a scout figure instead of a stormtrooper
should come in a small box than packet

If you are a star wars fan in the uk then you must get this as it is only available to get today.

author: legoguy2805
title: Imperial Speeder Bike
review:
I got this free with the Daily Mirror today. It comes in a little plastic bag with fold-out instructions. It is really fun to play with and comes with a stormtrooper.

Always put the Stormtrooper's arms below the controls, otherwise the clips below the handles will ease off.

Pros:
Stormtrooper
Good design
Quite fun to play with
Free!

Cons:
Can't hold onto the controls


Overall, very good for a promo, 4/5

author: Carl
title: Axe axels?
review:
This is my favourite of the 30004/5/6 sets. Before I built it I didn't think it would actually look like it was floating, but the axe axels take care of that. I am surprised however that this set didn't have a scout trooper, seeing as it is blatantly based on Endor, but I suppose LEGO is sticking with the most well known of each faction. I also find it surprising that there was no rebel one! Come on LEGO, its not that hard!

Pros:

Petite build
Doesn't take up much space
Stormtrooper
Axe axels
Price is just as petite as the build

Cons:

Nothing

THis set is a fantastic bargain and is good if, like me, your brother got all the sets with lots of Stormtroopers.

author: ChrisBricks1138
title: Imperial Speeder
review:
I got this set from the Daily Mirror Newspaper:

Pros: Stormtrooper Minifig
        Great design
        Good range of pieces

Cons: You have to turn the hands upside-down to fit the handlebars

This is a small, well designed promo set and I rate it 10/10

author: Cal_Zagy
title: A Great Lego Star Wars Set
review:
This set is great value for money, 65p (cost of the Daily Record) for 33 pieces is an amazing price to piece ratio. The set is a great addition to any Star Wars collection.

Pros.
-Several useful pieces.
-Lego handguns as controls
-Stormtrooper
-Inexpensive
-Axes

Cons
-None

Overall an excellent set.

author: thewish
title: Mini Speeders
review:
I got this with the Mirror promotion and like the others, the set is great. The one thing that appealed to me was that the speeder was minifigure-sized and it came with a stormtrooper. To me, that's just plain awesome.

PROS-
Little speeder
Small
Cheap
Minifig sized
Stormtrooper
Interesting use of pieces (e.g axe as thrusters

CONS-
None

Get a few of these and those Rebels better run.

author: Moscadini
title: Sold in the USA
review:
Even though this was a UK Exclusive, I just wanted to let everyone know that this set is now being sold in the USA.  Saw it over at Toys R Us in case anyone is asking.

I know, this is not a Review, but more of a heads up in case anyone wants it.

Pros:
  • Great addition for your Star Wars Collection

Cons:
  • None

author: Firox_5000
title: Get a stormtrooper
review: This storm trooper is great. You get a classic strom trooper minifigure as well as a speeder for him to ride. This is a great set and goes extremly well with classic star wars sets e.g battle of endor.

author: unleashed
title: This simple yet creative set appears at a local TRU! Is it at yours?
review:
When I saw this set in redone packaging at TRU, I got it. Of all places, why was it here? No time for questions, just get it!

I got this set mainly for the stormtrooper minifig, since I only have one. The set is great, it never falls apart, and the use of pieces amazes me because its so creative! I think this was some young builder who gave his idea to LEgo-hope he got credit. Pros and Cons:

  •    Pros:
  • Good use of parts
  • Bricks aren't that easy to find
  • Creative Design
  • Stormtrooper Minifig helps you build an army
  • Cons:
  • Scout Trooper does not appear
  • No blaster storage or blaster
  • Doesn't use basic speeder parts

author: tkettle9719
title: An Amazing Polybag Minifig set!
review:
I got this set for myself after Christmas a few years ago at Toys 'R' Us for myself, and think that is is a truly innovative set that never really appeared in the movies, and a fantastic way to build an army of Stormtroopers.

Pros

  • -The Stormtrooper minifig; enough said.
  • -The speeder bike is extremely clever with its use of parts.
  • …

Cons

  • -I wish a gun could have been included.
  • -I also wish that the speeder bike could be a bit more accurate.
  • …

This set is truly awesome, and doesn't have a large price tag at all, whether you're building the army up or just getting one, it's a great set that I recommend to all.
